name: SkydropSmartSprinklerController
0:
”Alexa, ask Skydrop to water Front Yard Flowers”
”Alexa, ask Skydrop for my forecast”
”Alexa, ask Skydrop to stop watering”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: skydrop
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Skydrop Alex Skill, you can manage your Skydrop Smart Sprinkler Controller and get the current watering status. You can start and stop watering specific zones, get the watering schedule/forecast and get the current state of watering.

A Skydrop Controller and Skydrop account are required to use this skill.
